item.title: About
item.description: Ben On Track is a freelance writer and blogger, passionate by travels !

item.title: Sri Lanka - The hidden gem
item.description: Starting from Colombo city, we decide to travel around the Cultural triangle of Sri Lanka… After a quick discussion with Beno√Æt who’s joining me on this trip, we decide to skip the beaches and instead focus on the strong sri lankan culture, mainly made of a mix of Sinhalese, Tamil and Muslim.

item.title: India - Kerala
item.description: Heading south to Kerala and its famous backwaters Kerala After another terrible night bus trip from Bangalore, and a small ferry trip, I’ve reached Kochi, my first city in Kerala on the Malabar coast of India.

item.title: India - Goa
item.description: I’ve landed in Goa, famous for its beaches and festive atmosphere. Knowing it’s the low season, I don’t expect to party but more to chill and relax…

item.title: India - Maharashtra
item.description: I’ve landed in Mumbai (also known as Bombay), capital city of Maharashtra. It’s funny to know that Mumbai city population exceeds the entire belgian population.

item.title: Must-Have travel apps !
Morocco - The North
item.description: This time we are ready to explore the crazy and busy moroccan medina. {{ < youtube FVj8mAGqa1o >}}

item.title: Spain - Andalusia
item.description: We have decided to plan a small trip to Andalusia from 22nd to 27th of January as we’ve still never been in south of Spain.

item.title: Scotland - Highlands
item.description: I have been dreaming about Scotland for a few months now since my colleague showed me some pictures of her trip up in the Highlands.

item.title: The Green Marathon
item.description: Enjoy this little video summarising our Green Marathon on the unfamous Molokoi trek in Cacao, French Guiana !

item.title: USA - the big Apple!
item.description: Enjoy this little video summarizing my first trip in USA !

item.title: French Guiana
item.description: Enjoy this little video summarising my 3.5 years in French Guiana, working for the Space Center.

item.title: Venezuela - Colombia
item.description: Trip 2012 Enjoy this little video summarising my trip with Julien to Venezuela and Colombia in 2012!

item.title: Contact
item.description: Strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me.
